name: NIKON D750
description: A full-frame DSLR camera known for its excellent image quality, 24.3MP sensor, and versatile performance, ideal for both photography and videography.

name: SONY A7III
description: A popular mirrorless camera featuring a 24.2MP sensor, fast autofocus, and impressive low-light performance, perfect for professionals and enthusiasts alike.

name: SIGMA 50MM
description: A high-performance prime lens, offering sharp images with a wide aperture, ideal for portraits and low-light shooting.

name: NIKON D750
description: The same powerful full-frame DSLR, providing outstanding detail and dynamic range for photographers.

name: SIGMA 50MM 1.4
description: A fast prime lens with a wide aperture, delivering superb depth of field and bokeh, perfect for portrait and artistic photography.

name: SONY COMBO
description: A comprehensive package including the Sony A7III camera, ideal lenses, and accessories, designed to cover all your photography needs.

name: NIKON 300MM
description: A telephoto lens ideal for wildlife, sports, and long-distance photography, offering sharpness and precision at a long focal length.

name: GODOX V1
description: A powerful and versatile round-head speedlight, offering high-speed sync, great light spread, and creative lighting options for photographers.
